name: craft
description: Build desktop apps with web languages, powered by Zig
author: Chris Breuer <chris@stacksjs.org>

scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run build:sdk
scripts.typecheck: cd packages/typescript && bun run typecheck && cd ../create-craft && bun run typecheck
scripts.clean: rm -rf packages/zig/zig-cache packages/zig/zig-out && bun run clean:packages
scripts.fmt: cd packages/zig && zig fmt src/ build.zig
scripts.fmt:check: cd packages/zig && zig fmt --check src/ build.zig
scripts.release: bun run build && bun run publish:all
scripts.publish:all: cd packages/typescript && bun publish && cd ../create-craft && bun publish
